ApplicationForm.name: ApplicationForm
ApplicationForm.description: Represents the high level information of an application that's submitted for the product.

AccountId.description: The account that's associated with the application.

BranchUnitId.description: The ID of the branch unit that owns the application.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, itâ€™s possible that this record was referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

LeadId.description: The ID of the lead associated with the application.

OpportunityId.description: The ID of the opportunity associated with the application.

OwnerId.description: ID of the user who created the record.

Stage.description: The stage in the approval process of the application.

SubmissionDate.description: The date when the application is submitted.

ThirdPartyLoanProviderAccountId.description: The ID of the third party loan provider account associated with the application.
